itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple creates an Image from a generalized (syspreped) blob and then an Availability Set with 2 VMs using Azure Managed Disks, created from that Image.
description: This template creates an Image from a generalized (syspreped) blob and then an Availability Set with 2 VMs using Azure Managed Disks, created from that Image.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys an Image and Availability Set with 2 Windows VM, using the that Image and Azure Managed Disks.
